dmca.title: Take Those Contracts Down!
dmca.body:
I write on behalf of my client IFCO Systems N.V. (IFCO) to object to the posting on the Onecle Inc. ("Onecle") website, onecle.com, of certain contracts between IFCO and other parties, including between IFCO and Schoeller Logistics Industries GmbH, which can be found at http://contracts.onecle.com/ifco/schoeller.consult.2001.06.22.shtml. IFCO did not
authorize Onecle to post this contact or any other contract to which IFCO is a party.
Accordingly, IFCO hereby demands that Onecle promptly remove this contract, and any
other contracts to which IFCO is a party, from its website and from any other websites
that it controls and that Onecle not make any unauthorized use of IFCO contacts now or
in the future.

In the event Onecle fails to comply with this demand within ten days of receipt of this letter, IFCO is prepared to pursue all available legal remedies to protect its rights. I
trust your cooperation will make any such action unnecessary.
